Welcome to SpiralMap’s documentation!

SpiralMap is a Python package that provides a collection of major models of the Milky Way’s spiral arms. This package allows users to extract and plot the spatial distribution of various spiral arm models from the literature, in Heliocentric, Galactocentric, and Polar coordinates.

It is written in Python 3 and is publicly available on PyPI and GitHub.

The documentation of SpiralMap is organized into the following sections:

  • User Guide

    A comprehensive guide including installation instructions, statement of need, description of available models, and a walkthrough of features.

  • API Documentation

    Detailed reference of all classes and functions included in the SpiralMap package.
